(hears two bots talking to one another)
"hmm, I wonder who that is?"
(Transforms into bot mode and stands behind a tree looking into the 
clearing.  Sees Megatron talking to another bot.  With Megatron standing in 
the way, she can't see who the other bot is.  She notices that Megatron is 
acting very nervously and doen't know why.)
"I think I'll just watch from here.  I wonder what is going on? Why is the 
all mighty Megatron so nervous.  He is never nervous.  Something must be 
terrably wrong."
(looks about the forests..checker her sensors.)
"Blast, my sensors are not working right.  Well, no time to worry about that 
now.  I'll have to get that fixed later on. "
(watches and listens to Megatron and the other bot)
